mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_POST ( post_type, category, title, content, writer_id, writer_type, branch_id, views, is_visible, post_visible, sport_type, recruit_max, recruit_end_date, display_start, display_end, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{postType}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{writerType}, #{branchId}, 0, 1, 1, #{sportType}, #{recruitMax}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{displayStart}, #{displayEnd}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT cp.post_id AS postId, cp.post_type AS postType, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.writer_id AS writerId, COALESCE(u.user_name, '탈퇴한 회원') AS writerName, cp.writer_type AS writerType, cp.branch_id AS branchId, cp.views, cp.is_visible AS isVisible, cp.post_visible AS postVisible, cp.sport_type AS sportType, cp.recruit_max AS recruitMax, cp.recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, cp.display_start AS displayStart, cp.display_end AS displayEnd, cp.created_at AS createdAt, cp.updated_at AS updatedAt, COUNT(crj.join_id) AS recruitCount FROM COMMUNITY_POST cp LEFT JOIN USERS u ON u.user_id = cp.writer_id LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_RECRUIT_JOIN crj ON crj.post_id = cp.post_id WHERE cp.post_type = 'COMMUNITY' AND cp.is_visible = 1 AND cp.post_visible = 1 AND (cp.category IS NULL OR cp.category NOT IN ('개인정보동의')) GROUP BY cp.post_id ORDER BY cp.created_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_POST WHERE post_type = 'COMMUNITY' AND is_visible = 1 AND post_visible = 1 AND (category IS NULL OR category NOT IN ('개인정보동의'))

SELECT cp.post_id AS postId, cp.post_type AS postType, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.writer_id AS writerId, COALESCE(u.user_name, '탈퇴한 회원') AS writerName, cp.writer_type AS writerType, cp.branch_id AS branchId, cp.views, cp.is_visible AS isVisible, cp.post_visible AS postVisible, cp.sport_type AS sportType, cp.recruit_max AS recruitMax, cp.recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, cp.display_start AS displayStart, cp.display_end AS displayEnd, cp.created_at AS createdAt, cp.updated_at AS updatedAt, COUNT(crj.join_id) AS recruitCount FROM COMMUNITY_POST cp LEFT JOIN USERS u ON u.user_id = cp.writer_id LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_RECRUIT_JOIN crj ON crj.post_id = cp.post_id WHERE cp.post_id = #{postId} AND cp.post_visible = 1 AND (cp.category IS NULL OR cp.category NOT IN ('개인정보동의')) GROUP BY cp.post_id
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, sport_type = #{sportType}, recruit_max = #{recruitMax}, recruit_end_date = #{recruitEndDate}, display_start = #{displayStart}, display_end = #{displayEnd}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_visible = 1 AND (category IS NULL OR category NOT IN ('개인정보동의'))
